content.title: Subsidy for Disabled Young Professionals
content.department: Haryana Backward Classes and Economically Weaker Sections Kalyan Nigam
content.details: The scheme 'Subsidy for Disabled Young Professionals' is implemented by the Haryana Backward Classes and Economically Weaker Sections Kalyan Nigam, Government of Haryana. Under this scheme, loans up to ₹25,00,000/- are provided to professionally educated unemployed disabled youth who fall under the OH, VH, HH, or MR categories, at different interest rates ranging from 4.5% to 8% per annum. The beneficiary should be a permanent resident of Haryana, aged between 18 and 45 years, who has obtained a professional degree from a recognized institute and has a disability of 40% or more to be eligible under this scheme.
benefits: Loans up to ₹25,00,000/- are provided to professionally educated unemployed disabled youth who fall under the OH, VH, HH, or MR categories.
The loan is available at different interest rates ranging from 4.5% to 8% per annum.
eligibility: The applicant should be a permanent resident of Haryana.
The applicant should have a disability of at least 40%.
The applicant's age should be between 18 and 45 years.
The applicant should have obtained a professional degree from a recognized Institute.
The scheme is for professionally educated unemployed disabled youth.
The activity proposed should be directly relevant to the professional degree of the applicant.
documents_required: Identity/Citizenship Proof (Any one of the following): Aadhaar Card
Age Proof (Any one of the following): Aadhaar Card
Resident Proof/Address Proof/Ownership Proof (Any one of the following): Ration Card, Haryana Domicile Certificate
Caste/Religion Proof (Any one of the following): Caste Certificate for reserved category
Disability Proof (Any one of the following): Disability Certificate (Disability should not be less than 40%)

faqs.question: What is the maximum loan amount provided under this scheme?
faqs.answer: The maximum loan amount provided is ₹25,00,000/-.

faqs.question: What are the interest rates for the loans?
faqs.answer: The interest rates for the loans range from 4.5% to 8% per annum.

faqs.question: What disabilities are covered under this scheme?
faqs.answer: The scheme covers Orthopedic Handicapped (OH), Visually Handicapped (VH), Hearing Handicapped (HH), and Mentally Retarded (MR) categories.

faqs.question: What is the age limit for applicants?
faqs.answer: Applicants must be between 18 and 45 years old.

faqs.question: What professional qualifications are required to apply?
faqs.answer: Applicants must have obtained a professional degree from a recognized institute.

faqs.question: How can I apply for this scheme?
faqs.answer: Eligible applicants can apply online through the Antyodaya-SARAL Portal at https://saralharyana.gov.in/.

faqs.question: Can I track my application status?
faqs.answer: Yes, applicants can track their application status through the Antyodaya-SARAL Portal by entering their Department Name, Scheme Name, and Application Reference ID at https://status.saralharyana.nic.in/.

faqs.question: Is there a minimum disability percentage required?
faqs.answer: Yes, applicants must have a disability of at least 40%.

faqs.question: Can applicants from other states apply for this scheme?
faqs.answer: No, only permanent residents of Haryana are eligible for this scheme.
